attributes.action: Lower the price of petrol/diesel and put a price cap on
attributes.additional_details: No evidence needed all you have to do it look at how much the prices have gone up this year
attributes.background:
Petrol/diesel prices are on the rise again.
These prices are far too high for us who count on getting to work and back While prices are this high people who are on minimum wage are struggling with the rising prices. I travel 110miles every single day for work it is costing me £80 a week please help

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We understand that you're concerned about fuel costs, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking the UK Government and Parliament to cut fuel taxes, if that's what you'd like to happen.
